items.title: Where Will American Express Stock Be in 1 Year?
items.description: American Express (NYSE: AXP) shareholders are finding their wallets a bit lighter at the start of the year, as the stock has declined approximately 29% from its 52-week high.  Despite the credit services giant posting record financial results for 2024, concerns about the strength of the U.S. economy are weighing on the company's outlook.  Let's explore where shares of American Express might be headed in one year.
